verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:10
verses.text: We are fools for Christ’s sake, but ye are wise in Christ; we are weak, but ye are strong; ye are honourable, but we are despised.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:11
verses.text: Even unto this present hour we both hunger, and thirst, and are naked, and are buffeted, and have no certain dwellingplace;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:12
verses.text: And labour, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we suffer it:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:13
verses.text: Being defamed, we intreat: we are made as the filth of the world, and are the offscouring of all things unto this day.
